name: Mr. Spoopy
description:
Tiem to b spoopy!!!

Made as an entry for the Low Effort Jam 16, you ply as Mr. Spoopy, who wants to become the most spoopy ghost around! And u gotta help hem!

  • Use da mouse to move, i guess
  • Scare people with left click
  • Become the spoopyist in 1 m,in or else by scaring aboot 50 people
